subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
Cheating
lead_paragraph: Taoufik Makhloufi of Algeria was expelled, then later reinstated, after he stopped running in an 800-meter heat. He was accused of quitting to preserve his endurance for Tuesday’s 1,500-meter final.
snippet: Taoufik Makhloufi of Algeria was expelled, then later reinstated, after he stopped running in an 800-meter heat. He was accused of quitting to preserve his endurance for Tuesday’s 1,500-meter final.
